name: Star Valor
description: Take control of your own spaceship, with a vast galaxy to explore, mine, quest, trade, fight and even craft your own weapons. Start small, improve, complete missions, gather allies (or hire mercenaries), grow big and powerful.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any GPU with 256MB memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
